author: lvnilesh
body: This change will help keep the image small

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@lvnilesh**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: garethr
comments.body: Note that this won't actually reduce the image size, unless the image in question is squashed. Docker build uses a layered filesystem, so removing the file in another layer still retains the file (and the size) in the previous layer. You can see another approach here: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/1992

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Restarted travis CI due to time out.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @garethr is correct, the binary still exists in the layer where it was added. Closing, but thanks for contributing!

title: This change will help keep the image small
